commands.description: Get notified about updates to a project
commands.title: Link project

commands.description: Adjust notification settings for this channel
commands.title: Notification settings

appDefinitions.longDescription:
With Asana's work management platform, your team can stay focused on their goals, projects, and tasks - no matter when or where they work. 

**Make conversations actionable**
Collaborate on Asana tasks and projects and keep work connected, without having to leave Microsoft Teams. Directly translate Microsoft Teams conversations into actionable tasks.

**Maximize visibility**
See Asana tasks, projects, portfolios, and status updates with Microsoft Teams. Search the information you need, share context with stakeholders, and see work details by unfurling Asana objects directly in Microsoft Teams.

**Stay informed about relevant updates in Asana**
Receive important notifications from your inbox. Tailor your notification preferences per channel, then follow the progress of tasks within your Microsoft Teams channels. Keep track of information you need in Asana, while staying focused and connected in Microsoft Teams.

**Prioritize work, identify blockers, and draft status updates with Asana AI**
Asana AI is your teammate for prioritizing work, identifying blockers, and even drafting status updates. Ask Asana AI any natural language questions and it will respond to you within seconds to help you move work and decisions forward without leaving Microsoft Teams.


**Connect Microsoft Teams to Asana**
This integration is available for free to all Asana customers who also have a Microsoft Teams account. Asana AI is available to paid Asana customers only 
New to Asana? [Sign up for free 竊余(https://asana.com/create-account)

**Additional resources**
[Product guide article 竊余(https://asana.com/guide/help/api/microsoft-teams)
[Asana Academy: 7 ways to use Asana and Microsoft Teams 竊余(https://academy.asana.com/7-ways-to-use-asana-for-teams)
Reach out to [Asana Support 竊余(https://asana.com/support) for additional help
appDefinitions.shortDescription: Turn conversations into action items in Asana to keep work on track
